page.title: 13MANDALAY CARAVAN SITE
page.content: Mandalay Farm is a medium sized camp site recognized by the Caravan and Camping Clubs. This secluded site is pleasantly situated in 12.5 acres of open meadowland.There is an abundance of wild flowers due to the lack of sprays and pesticides.The only amenities provided are one water tap, cess pit and rubbish pit. There are two horses which can be ridden by visitors to the site. The camp site was bought by the present owner in 1956 and has on average 2 or 3 caravans per week. Tents are also welcome at this site. There are 4 rallies a year attended by an average of 2O caravans. People from all over Europe have visited the site and often return.
